test.common
Class TestUtility

java.lang.Object
  test.common.TestUtility

public class TestUtility
extends java.lang.Object

Class including utility static methods for launching/killing agents, requesting generic AMS actions and creating remote JADE instances.

Author:
Giovanni Caire - TILAB
